headline.print_headline: The Travelers Remains The Tour’s Proving Ground
headline.seo: Travelers Championship Remains Proving Ground for Young Players
headline.main: The Travelers Remains the Tour’s Proving Ground

docs.snippet: The Travelers Championship has succeeded by developing relationships with the next generation of stars and providing them with sponsor exemptions....
docs.abstract: Travelers Championship golf tournament has succeeded by developing relationships with the next generation of stars and providing them with sponsor exemptions.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Travelers Championship has succeeded by developing relationships with the next generation of stars and providing them with sponsor exemptions.

headline.seo: LeRoy Neiman, Artist Who Captured Sports and Public Life, Dies at 91
headline.main: LeRoy Neiman Dies at 91; Artist of Bold Life and Bright Canvases

docs.snippet: Mr. Neiman, who painted racetrack scenes and Olympic contests, depicted public life in gaudy colors....
docs.abstract: LeRoy Neiman, whose brilliantly colored, impressionistic sketches of sporting events and the international high life made him one of the most popular artists in the United States, dies at age 91.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Neiman, who painted racetrack scenes and Olympic contests, depicted public life in gaudy colors.

headline.print_headline: Home Prices in the West Are Rebounding as Inventory Shrinks
headline.seo: West’s Home Prices Rebounding as Availability Shrinks
headline.main: Home Prices in the West Are Rebounding as Inventory Shrinks

docs.snippet: While prices in the Phoenix area rose by 25 percent, fewer foreclosures and a lower inventory of homes were more a factor than was a local economic boom....
docs.abstract: Prices for existing homes in the Phoenix metropolitan area climbed by 25 percent during the 12-month period ending in April, pointing to a decisive shift in the market realities in a region hard-hit by the housing crisis; rise in prices may be driven less by a resurgence in the local economy than by a dearth of houses for sale.
docs.lead_paragraph: While prices in the Phoenix area rose by 25 percent, fewer foreclosures and a lower inventory of homes were more a factor than was a local economic boom.

headline.print_headline: 2 Convicted in Killing of Hotel Heir
headline.seo: Convictions in Killings of Fontainebleau Hotel Heir and His Mother
headline.main: 2 Convicted in Killing of Hotel Heir

docs.snippet: A Westchester County jury found Narcy Novack and Cristobal Veliz guilty of orchestrating the murders of her millionaire husband, as well as his mother, in a quest for the family estate....
docs.abstract: Westchester County jury convicts Narcy Novack and her brother Cristobal Veliz on charges that they orchestrated the 2009 murders of her millionaire husband Ben Novack Jr and his mother Bernice Novack in a grab for the family estate; Ben Novack was murdered in a Rye Brook, NY, hotel room and his mother at her Fort Lauderdale, Fla home.
docs.lead_paragraph: A Westchester County jury found Narcy Novack and Cristobal Veliz guilty of orchestrating the murders of her millionaire husband, as well as his mother, in a quest for the family estate.

headline.print_headline: In Iran, They Want Fun, Fun, Fun
headline.seo: In Iran, They Want Fun, Fun, Fun
headline.main: In Iran, They Want Fun, Fun, Fun

docs.snippet: Young Iranians are tuning out. Of those encountered on a visit, many seemed less interested in religious fanaticism than in sex, drugs and rock ’n’ roll....
docs.abstract: Nicholas D Kristof Op-Ed column notes the surprising rebelliousness of young Iranians, many of whom favor Western pleasures like drugs and rock 'n' roll over politics and religious fanaticism; suggests that if there is no war between Iran and the West, which would probably strengthen the regime, hard-liners will likely fade away and Iran will end up looking something like Turkey.
docs.lead_paragraph: Young Iranians are tuning out. Of those encountered on a visit, many seemed less interested in religious fanaticism than in sex, drugs and rock ’n’ roll.

headline.print_headline: The Biggest Rival for a Congresswoman From Brooklyn Isn’t Even on the Ballot
headline.seo: Congresswoman Nydia M. Velázquez’s Biggest Foe Isn’t on the Ballot
headline.main: The Biggest Rival for a Congresswoman From Brooklyn Isn’t Even on the Ballot

docs.snippet: Nydia M. Velázquez’s best-known challenger for her seat is Councilman Erik M. Dilan, but she acts as though her biggest rival is Vito J. Lopez, the Brooklyn Democratic Party’s leader....
docs.abstract: Ten-term Democratic Congresswoman Nydia M Velazquez continues to campaign aggressively in primary battle to represent the New York State's Seventh Congressional District, the boundaries of which have changed significantly due to redistricting; Velazquez's most visible challenger is Councilman Erik M Dilan, who has the strong support of Brooklyn Democratic Party head Vito J Lopez.
docs.lead_paragraph: Nydia M. Velázquez’s best-known challenger for her seat is Councilman Erik M. Dilan, but she acts as though her biggest rival is Vito J. Lopez, the Brooklyn Democratic Party’s leader.

headline.print_headline: Upstate Legislators Aid Caterer in Its Bid for Liquor License on Park Ave.
headline.seo: Upstate Lawmakers Back Manhattan Caterer in Liquor License Bid
headline.main: Upstate Legislators Aid Caterer in Its Bid for Liquor License on Park Ave.

docs.snippet: Two state lawmakers, from Binghamton and near Buffalo, are pushing a measure that would allow a Manhattan caterer to secure a liquor license, which has drawn local opposition....
docs.abstract: Rose Group Park Avenue LLC successfully enlists the help of upstate lawmakers in its fight to secure a liquor license for its catering hall at Park Avenue and 63rd Street; State Senate unexpectedly votes to support the caterers request, despite opposition from Manhattan neighbors, local community board and a nearby church; state law prohibits businesses from receiving a liquor license if they are within 200 feet of a school or place of worship.
docs.lead_paragraph: Two state lawmakers, from Binghamton and near Buffalo, are pushing a measure that would allow a Manhattan caterer to secure a liquor license, which has drawn local opposition.

headline.print_headline: Albany Bill on Organ Donation Urges License Applicants to Act
headline.seo: Albany Bill Urges Would-Be Drivers to Donate Organs
headline.main: Albany Bill on Organ Donation Urges License Applicants to Act

docs.snippet: The bill, passed on Wednesday, is intended to persuade would-be drivers to make an active choice about organ donation, which would not be mandatory....
docs.abstract: New York State Legislature passes a measure aimed at increasing the low number of organ donors in the state by forcing driver's license applicants to make an active choice about their donation status; measure would change license forms to include a section that applicants must fill out to either accept or reject putting their name into the organ donor registry.
docs.lead_paragraph: The bill, passed on Wednesday, is intended to persuade would-be drivers to make an active choice about organ donation, which would not be mandatory.

headline.print_headline: Pandora Faces Rivals for Ears and Ads
headline.seo: Songza and Spotify Challenge Pandora for Ears and Ads
headline.main: Pandora Faces Rivals for Ears and Ads

docs.snippet: The playlist app Songza and the digital music service called Spotify, the latest challengers to Pandora, have prompted warnings from analysts about the possible effects these updates will have on Pandora....
docs.abstract: Playlist app Songza and the digital music service called Spotify, the latest challengers to Pandora, have prompted warnings from analysts about the possible effects their splashy new updates will have on Pandora; Songza's new version of its mobile app was downloaded 1.15 million times in 10 days.
docs.lead_paragraph: The playlist app Songza and the digital music service called Spotify, the latest challengers to Pandora, have prompted warnings from analysts about the possible effects these updates will have on Pandora.
